TEXT.TITLE: STOLTENBERG SAYS GLOBAL SHARE CRASH OVERDONE
TEXT.BODY: West German Finance Minister Gerhard Stoltenberg said the global share price crash was overdone and unfounded. Stoltenberg was speaking at a press conference. REUTER
